tracks.text: A knight, mage, and ninja walk through the forest grotto.
In the hollow, the knight steps on webbing.
The ninja looks up and turns blue with shock.
The knight looks up through webbing.
Red clown face markings
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
Psyger-0 swings a log. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by her human form.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
Orcelot, wearing armor and a purple cape, sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
Text, 10, Let's Go Tomb Raiding!!
Sunraku looks up at spider webs stretched across shadowy trees.
Around the bend, he looks at a large, dark cavernous tree hollow.
Text, No Entry
Text, Other players are fighting this area boss.
A knight falls and lands on the ground.
Boulder
The boulder disappears
The no entry block disappears
He walks into the cavernous hollow
A barrier forms behind them. Label, No Entry
Spider legs walk across webs high above Sunraku.
He looks up. The mage and ninja hang from the ceiling by webbing, sparkling red, wearing expressions of lifeless horror.
He leaps
He runs up the wall of the tree, avoiding the webbing
Rush Slash, Quick Spin, Loop Slash Level 5, Accel Level 6, One-Boat Leap
A boulder rolls towards him. He dodges.
Emul runs around screaming. The boulder lands behind her.
He grabs the web and swings up until he's stepping on it.
Boulders
He runs up the webbing, avoiding falling boulders.
Emul avoids the boulders
He leaps, looking down on the giant black spider. Red label, Area Boss, Clown Spider
Spider strikes.
Sunraku parries
He bounces off a web and flips in the air,
He bounces back
The spider shakes and roars. Sunraku lands on a web
The spider falls, leaving a trail of red pixels
It shoots web
He throws a knife. It hits the web just shy of the wall, and the knife and web fall.
The spider falls all the way to the floor. Emul runs around.
He looks around, then up.
Boulders and logs hang from the ceiling by web.
Emul watches the Clown Spider trembles as it starts to stand
Boulders and logs land on top of the spider.
Sunraku cuts the webbing holding the traps.
The objects fall
He watches from above
The spider trembles
He makes his way down
He jumps down along the wall until he reaches the floor
He leaps as the spider pounces.
From above, he stares at the clown face
The face transforms into Lycagon
Lycagon swipes. Sunraku stares at his lost limbs. Lycagon howls at the moon.
He strikes the spider's abdomen with Spiral Edge
Crits stack up
The spider vibrates, swells
and explodes
Text, Area Boss, Clown Spider, Dispatch Complete
Message dialog pops up
In the marshes, the Mud Digger dissipates. A blond girl looks at a message dialog.
Player name, Oikatzo
Rock Roll Game Shop
People browse games. A poster for SLF reads Major Summer Update!!, The Severed Sea, The Frontier Fleet, The New Land, New Job!!
Mana stocks shelves
Rei turns to look
Random guy walks by. She looks down.
She looks down. Mana smiles.
Rei walks down the sidewalk
She walks past a convenience store.
Rakuro reads a game magazine in the window.
She runs away and hides behind a post box.
Kei Uomi, Pro Gamer
A crow flies. Dark clouds gather over a run down mansion in the woods.
She stabs a knife into the table
She stares.
Sunraku and Katzo look at each other, then back to her
Light shines through gray clouds
Rakuro returns the magazine titled Weekly VR Full Diver
He leaves the convenience store with a bag of energy drinks
Rakuro looks at Rei, hiding behind the post box
She walks up to him
He looks at his phone and furrows his brow
He runs off. She bows 15 degrees.
Rakuro's house
Rakuro pulls out an Energy kaiser energy drink, places a small card in a computer tower, and puts on goggles.
Emul hovers over his head
A white door appears
UniteRounds
She runs down the palace hallway, passing Paetz
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, Psyger-0, a knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on an outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and Psyger-0 stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
